医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
患有先兆子痫的女性在怀孕期间会加速衰老先兆子痫是一种危及生命的血压升高，是一种神秘的疾病。每年，它都会导致全球超过 70,000 名女性死亡。由于科学家不知道其原因，因此他们缺乏有针对性的治疗策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Women-with-pre-eclampsia-undergo-accelerated-aging-during-pregnancy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Women-with-pre-eclampsia-undergo-accelerated-aging-during-pregnancy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=39820f88-17b7-45b6-be6f-b9027840e572 Thu, 24 Aug 2023 20:56:32 -0400 Women with pre-eclampsia undergo accelerated aging during pregnancy
UTMB 研究可能指出拉沙热的有效治疗方法德克萨斯大学医学分部的新研究可能指出拉沙热的有效治疗方法，拉沙热是西非大部分地区常见的一种危险且往往致命的疾病，但被认为是对全球健康的主要威胁。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/UTMB-research-潜在-points-to-an- effective-treatment-for-Lassa-fever.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/UTMB-research-pottially-points-to-an- effective-treatment-for-Lassa-fever.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=63a6549b-54ad-498b-aaae-0a3fc48228d2 Thu, 24 Aug 2023 20:47:45 -0400 UTMB research potentially points to an effective treatment for Lassa fever
研究人员发现再生和修复髓磷脂的新生物机制贝勒医学院副教授、德克萨斯儿童医院 Jan and Dan Duncan 神经学研究所研究员 Hyun Kyoung Lee 博士领导的一项研究发现了一种再生和修复髓磷脂的新生物机制，髓磷脂是一种绝缘的保护鞘。神经元纤维在确保快速准确的神经传递中起着至关重要的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Researchers-discover-new-biological-mechanism-to-regenerate-and-repair-myelin.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Researchers-discover-new-biological-mechanism-to-regenerate-and-repair-myelin.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d71d4859-9911-4c36-95e1-b5c260baf71c Thu, 24 Aug 2023 20:41:25 -0400 Researchers discover new biological mechanism to regenerate and repair myelin
新模型预测 10 年内死于乳腺癌的风险由纳菲尔德初级保健健康科学系领导的牛津大学研究小组开发了一种新模型，可以可靠地预测女性在十年内患乳腺癌并随后死亡的可能性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/New-model-predicts-10-year-risk-of-dying-from-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/New-model-predicts-10-year-risk-of-dying-from-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8531dde9-82c7-4fd0-ab49-c921527e5ec0 Thu, 24 Aug 2023 14:15:00 -0400 New model predicts 10-year risk of dying from breast cancer
与年龄相关的血液系统变化会加剧结肠癌佛罗里达大学医学院的研究人员发现，血液系统中与年龄相关的常见变化如何使某些结肠癌生长得更快。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Age-lated-changes-in-the-blood-system-can-exacerbate-colon-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Age-lated-changes-in-the-blood-system-can-exacerbate-colon-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=baa1d4ea-f459-4238-bc6a-eec543ce3624 Thu, 24 Aug 2023 14:09:41 -0400 Age-related changes in the blood system can exacerbate colon cancer
KAUST 研究人员驳斥了靶向癌症治疗的挑战抑制关键蛋白质的药物应该为白血病和乳腺癌提供新的靶向癌症治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/KAUST-researchers-refute-challenges-to-targeted-cancer-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/KAUST-researchers-refute-challenges-to-targeted-cancer-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=987d4060-e55f-41af-998b-c28a37dca844 Thu, 24 Aug 2023 14:01:17 -0400 KAUST researchers refute challenges to targeted cancer therapy
可以训练肺细胞对抗炎症炎症是我们身体免疫系统反应的标准部分。但有时这种反应在我们的肺部变得过度活跃，导致炎症继续不受控制，这可能是致命的。许多 COVID-19 造成的死亡是由于过度炎症导致急性肺损伤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Lung-cells-can-be-trained-to-counteract-inflammation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Lung-cells-can-be-trained-to-counteract-inflammation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e9c840eb-c32e-4d2a-86c6-849a0b62d3be Thu, 24 Aug 2023 13:54:36 -0400 Lung cells can be trained to counteract inflammation
被忽视的大脑区域可能在药物复发中发挥关键作用印第安纳大学医学院的研究人员发现了一个被忽视的大脑区域，该区域可能在吸毒障碍患者复发的可能性中发挥关键作用，即使在长期戒断期之后也是如此。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Neglected-brain-region-could-play-a-ritic-role-in-drug-relapse.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Neglected-brain-region-could-play-a-ritic-role-in-drug-relapse.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0627cb14-8d93-4437-8aac-876c5946e52c Thu, 24 Aug 2023 13:49:06 -0400 Neglected brain region could play a critical role in drug relapse
尿液腺嘌呤水平被发现是糖尿病肾病的预测和致病生物标志物德克萨斯大学健康科学中心的研究人员表示，尿液中腺嘌呤（肾脏产生的一种代谢物）水平可以预测糖尿病患者即将出现的进行性肾衰竭，并且是其致病生物标志物，这一发现可能会导致早期诊断和干预。 Antonio（也称为 UT Health San Antonio）于 8 月 24 日在《临床研究杂志》上报道。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Urine-levels-of-adenine-found-to-be-predictive-and-causative-biomarker-of-diabetic-kidney-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Urine-levels-of-adenine-found-to-be-predictive-and-causative-biomarker-of-diabetic-kidney-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e8f6af7d-52ab-4703-8e7e-2ce8b76d9d45 Thu, 24 Aug 2023 13:36:45 -0400 Urine levels of adenine found to be predictive and causative biomarker of diabetic kidney disease
研究人员发现基因组拓扑与癌症突变存在之间的联系加州大学圣地亚哥分校的研究人员发现了人类基因组的拓扑结构与人类癌症突变的存在之间的联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Researchers-find-link- Between-topography-of-the-genome-and-presence-of-cancer-mutations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230824/Researchers-find-link- Between-topography-of-the-genome-and-presence-of-cancer-mutations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5b100005-b64a-4bcf-9456-1c64506e58b8 Thu, 24 Aug 2023 13:27:23 -0400 Researchers find link between topography of the genome and presence of cancer mutations
